en-US.summary: Seasonal foods for each season and how to pick the ripe ones.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask seasonal chef for a seasonal ingredient
Alexa tell seasonal chef to recommend a seasonal ingredient
en-US.name: Whats In Season
en-US.description:
Know the best seasonal ingredients from each season and helpful tips on how to pick the ripest ones.

To start, say "Alexa, launch Chef" or "Alexa, open Chef".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
